overview: Concepció, a novice, is held prisoner in a remote monastery after exiling from Mallorca to Barcelona during the Spanish Civil War. She is supported and protected by the Mother Abbess, but the arrival of a Bishop that adores God as a tool to feast a monster inside him turns her world upside down. Confused, Concepció strives for reconnecting with her land through her music, but she’s caged by evil.
title: Blood Crime
